message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $14,000. I believe this price reflects the value I see in the product while staying within my budget.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob.  I understand your perspective on the value. To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $19,000. This is a significant reduction and reflects my willingness to make a deal happen.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $16,000. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
